name: albums_get_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool shazam.
Tool description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com
API description: Fetch detailed information of an album using the Shazam API.

is_id.description:
The value of 'albums->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details OR .../artists/get-albums OR .../artists/get-summary
The value of 'id' field returned in .../artists/get-albums OR .../artists/get-latest-release endpoint
The value of 'albumadamid' field returned in .../songs/v2/detect OR .../songs/detect endpoint

l.description: The language code for the details. Defaults to 'en-US'.
